observation.output:
Testing edge cases for HPacker alignment fix...

Test 1: Same height elements
  align='top': offsets = [0, 0]
  align='bottom': offsets = [0, 0]
  ✓ Same height elements work correctly

Test 2: Elements with descent
  align='top': offsets = [15, 3]
    Tops at y=35 and y=33 -> NOT aligned
  align='bottom': offsets = [5, 3]
    Bottoms at y=5 and y=3 -> NOT aligned
  ✓ Elements with descent work correctly

Test 3: Other alignments should not be affected
  align='center': offsets = [5.0, 0.0]
  align='baseline': offsets = [0.0, 0.0]
  ✓ Other alignments are not affected

Test 4: Single element
  align='top': offsets = [5]
  align='bottom': offsets = [0]
  ✓ Single element works correctly

All edge cases passed! ✓
